title: Can't Judge A Book By Its Cover
itunes:title: Can't Judge A Book By Its Cover
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I've been dating the 6’4 tall drink of water for a few months. He is honest generous humorous and fun to be around. We decided it was time to take the next step in our relationship since we have been flirting and making suggestive comments to each other for weeks.......

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
